verbose_text: In a previous study, we observed that heat shock transcription factor 1 (HSF1), a major transcription factor of HSPs, significantly attenuated 3-nitropropionic acid (3NP)-induced reactive oxygen species (ROS) production and apoptosis through the expression of HSP 70 in striatal cells.
